name: Xenon 2: Megablast
overview: Xenon 2: Megablast is a video game originally produced for the Amiga and Atari ST, and later converted to the PC, Sega Master System, Sega Mega Drive, Commodore CDTV, Acorn Archimedes, and Game Boy platforms. The game is a sequel to Xenon and was designed by The Bitmap Brothers (although coded by The Assembly Line). It became one of their most well-known titles. In 2016 it was ported to the Atari Jaguar.
